Recommended By Curators
"Perhaps the best arcade revival in recent years is now on PC. Features a cool neon flair and has all the features you need to share your hi-score."

About This Game

It's time to gear up!

Get ready for more ghost chain gobbling and frantic action in PAC-MAN® CE-DX+! The award-winning chomping game makes a shattering debut on Steam with even more content and a refined user-interface to compare high scores with your friends! Wake up the ghosts, form the longest train of pursuers and chomp as many as you can at blazing speed to beat the score! And never forget to manage you a way out using your skills or you’ll have to force an escape route with your bombs!

A Pac-man experience that will definitely surprise you!

Online Features

  • Beat the game!
    Follow your self-progress and unlock all the game medals by defeating the mazes in the most arduous conditions
  • Intense rivalry
    Break all leaderboards and challenge all your friends directly on social medias.

Key Features

  • Infernal speed arcade
    Blaze through neon-like mazes and reach maximum speed to beat the score.
  • Vast maze line-up
    7 mazes with unique layout, special options, features presenting each a specific challenge.
  • Tons of intense courses
    5 different game modes for a complete set of challenges to overcome in each maze.
  • Your own Pac-man experience
    Customize difficulty, music, characters and maze visuals to re-create your favorite Pac-man experience.
READ MORE

System Requirements

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8
    • Processor: 1 GHz or faster 32-bit (x86) or 64-bit (x64) processor
    • Memory: 1 GB RAM
    • Graphics: DirectX 9 graphics device
    • DirectX: Version 9.0c
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Hard Drive: 500 MB available space
    • Sound Card: DirectX 9 sound device
READ MORE

PAC-MAN™ Championship Edition DX＋＆© 2013 NAMCO BANDAI Games Inc.

Mr.Cypher!
1,645 products in account
176 reviews
Recommended
5.1 hrs on record
Posted: August 5
Man ive been wanting this one for a good bit now :) This game is full nostalgia!! I remember when i was wee lad pumping quarters in a PAC-MAN game waiting for the Movies to start at the local movie theater with my old man :)

This game does not disapoint ! The controls are easy and basic ,just directions and one button pretty much! I would highly recommended useing a game controller,makes it a bit more faster to control.The games gfx are real nice a nice throw back to 80s neon and colors :)

I say if you are a Pac-Man fan get this game now !!! So im giving this one 2 thumbs up !!! CHOMP YOU LATER !!!

Posted: October 3
This may be the shortest review I've ever written thus far. But hey, the old adage about good things coming in small packages is absolutely dead on here! PAC-MAN Champion Edition DX+ is worth its weight in gold. It's a game that you can pick up and easily loose hours too. All free of guilt and with a smile upon your lips! It runs amazingly well, and well... corners on rails. Buy it or gift it! You and yours won't be disappointed!

Celtic Batman
2,073 products in account
171 reviews
Recommended
1.8 hrs on record
Posted: August 5
Bought in a bundle for about 33c. It pays homage to the old arcade game of course, with a few different maps and twists to the gameplay.

I found the gameplay in the time attack to be really easy, more a reminder of the old Apple II game 'Snack Attack' with pac-man skins (and others - Namco bring Dig Dug back, to the PC!).

As an achievement addict, this was a quick 100%, in just over an hour I think. Beyond that, trying to get a better score had some replay value, but beyond the maps and different skins, the replay value is less now than when I was in the arcades as a kid.

In a bundle - 8.5 / 10 for nostalgia and quick 100%
Full price - 2/10
